name: Last Dream: World Unknown
description: Last Dream: World Unknown incorporates the best features of classic RPGs: replayability and complete immersion into a vast world, rich with detail.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4400 or similar Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 2.4GHz dual-core (Intel Core i5 or similar) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 760 or similar Storage: 2 GB available space
